ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
batoms_api is a API for Beautiful Atoms package. Beautiful Atoms is
a Python package for editing and rendering atoms and molecules
objects using blender. A Python interface that allows for automating
workflows.
about.summary: Blendase is a Python package for drawing and rendering atoms, molecules and crystal using blender.

about.description:
batoms_api is a API for Beautiful Atoms package. Beautiful Atoms is
a Python package for editing and rendering atoms and molecules
objects using blender. A Python interface that allows for automating
workflows.
about.summary: Blendase is a Python package for drawing and rendering atoms, molecules and crystal using blender.

name: batoms-api
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "batoms-api" %}
{% set version = "0.1.4" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/batoms_api-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e6b44f09cedcb1a6d468a137d5c2ded42b27997924b1c280d69ccffbe31f8795

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: python
  entry_points:
    - batoms=batoms_api.cli.main:main
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - ase

test:
  imports:
    - batoms_api
    - batoms_api.cli
  commands:
    - pip check
    - batoms --help
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/superstar54/beautiful-atoms-api
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'Blendase is a Python package for drawing and rendering atoms, molecules and crystal using blender.'
  description: |
    batoms_api is a API for Beautiful Atoms package. Beautiful Atoms is
    a Python package for editing and rendering atoms and molecules
    objects using blender. A Python interface that allows for automating
    workflows.
  doc_url: https://github.com/superstar54/beautiful-atoms-api
  dev_url: https://github.com/superstar54/beautiful-atoms-api

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
